title: Can the executor of a Will going through probate start emptying the home before the assets and debts has been
question: filed with the courts? It hasn't even been 4 months since the executor was place and she has already decided that is going to clear the home. I'm in the will and I was left whatever I want from the inside of the home / personal items.
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Real estate and bankruptcy,Real estate,Wills and estates,Estates,Estate assets,Estate property,Wills,Executor of will,Probate,Probate assets,Probate court
answers:
Based on limited information provided, your rights have been violated.
Your attorney may contact executor to demand she terminate emptying house and respect your rights.
